牚字的基本解释

牚
chēng
同“撑”。

牚
chèng
斜柱。
桌椅等腿中间的横木。

牚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chèng］
［《廣韻》他孟切，去映，徹。］
［《集韻》恥孟切，去映，徹。］
起支撑作用的构件。如建筑物梁上的斜柱，桌椅腿间横档等。
[②]［chēng］
通“撐1”。
支撑；抵拒。参见“牚2距”。

牚字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【牙字部】　牚； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页695第10
【廣韻】他孟切【集韻】恥孟切，?音儻。【廣韻】邪柱也。【集韻】支柱也。　又【集韻】抽庚切，音瞠。義同。本作樘。或作橕橖。

牚字的源字形

牚字的起名意思

暂无。

牚
Basic explanation of words
牚
chēng
Same as "support".
牚
chèng
Inclined column.
The horizontal wood in the middle of the legs such as tables and chairs.
牚
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chèng］
["Guangyun" He Mengqie, go to film, tore. ]
["Ji Yun" Shame Mengqie, go to film, thoroughly. ]
A supporting member. Such as the inclined column on the beam of the building, the crosspiece between the legs of the table and chair, etc.
[②] [chēng]
Link "Support 1".
Support; resist. See "Ran 2 Distance".
牚
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Teeth Department] 　牚; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 695 No. 10
[Guang Yun] He Meng Qi [Ji Yun] Shame Meng Qi,? Sound Huan. [Guang Yun] The evil pillar also. [Jiyun] The pillar is also.　[Jiyun] Pumping Geng and cutting, and the sound is stunned. The same meaning. This is 樘. Or as a moat.
